title: RIOT FIX THIS ISSUE HOLY SHIT
body: as i got into champ select i was trying to choose an adc. whilst looking at counters for caitlyn i was kicked for not choosing a champion yet i had 25 seconds to choose? i have now got -10LP and have got a 30minute QUEUE FIX THIS PLZ I WANT MY LP BACK AND THIS QUEUE GONE

replies.body:
This might happen if your computer's time is de-synced with the server's time. Do you have your time set to auto-sync against a server?

Also, do you experience lag at all while playing?
yeah i have both those haha, ive set my date 7 days forward haha

Well, that's pretty self-explanatory then.

Best of luck with your future games.
